hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $20+60$ then add $3$ then add $3$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{23}+\purpleC{63}=&\greenD{20}+\greenD{3}+\purpleC{60}+\purpleC{3} \\
=&\greenD{20}+\purpleC{60}+\greenD{3}+\purpleC{3}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategy can be used to add $23+63$.**

- Add $20+60$ then add $3$ then add $3$.

question.content:
